name: Nextjs Content Management System
description: Build content management system using Nextjs
prompt:
Create a content management system with:
- Article creation and editing
- Media library management
- User roles and permissions
- Content scheduling
- SEO optimization tools
- Analytics integration
- Multi-language support
- Template system
- Comment moderation
- Mobile-responsive admin

Requirements:
- Rich text editor
- File upload system
- User authentication
- Content workflow
- SEO features
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features

name: Nextjs Event Management Platform
description: Build event management platform using Nextjs
prompt:

- Event creation and scheduling
- Ticketing system
- Attendee registration
- Calendar integration
- Venue management
- Speaker profiles
- Sponsor management
- Live streaming
- Mobile app
- Payment processing

Requirements:

- Payment processing
- Real-time updates
- Mobile optimization
- Social features
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features
